newsitem.title: USA: Triad Systems stake cut by Gabelli group.
newsitem.headline: Triad Systems stake cut by Gabelli group.

text.p: A group led by New York investment manager Mario Gabelli said Friday it cut its stake in Triad Systems Corp to 1,031,200 common shares or 5.78 percent from 7.63 percent previously held.
In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include the sale of 335,000 common shares between Feb 11 and 19 at $9.3750 to $9.8747 per share.
Triad Systems, based in Livermore Calif., creates business and informaton management solutions for the automotive parts aftermarket and retail hardgoods industry.
